Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: This property contains the available OEM specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

DCIMCooling.description: This is the schema definition for the DCIM Cooling Zone.
DCIMCooling.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent a DCIM Cooling Zone for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

AirHandlingUnit.description: This is the definition for a AirHandlingUnit collection.
AirHandlingUnit.longDescription: These properties shall be the definition for a AirHandlingUnit collection for a Redfish implementation.

Alarms.description: Contains the naivgation pointer to the equipment Alarm collection.
Alarms.longDescription: This property shall be a reference to a resource of type AlarmCollection that contains the alarms for the equipment.

CRAC.description: This is the definition for a CRAC collection.
CRAC.longDescription: These properties shall be the definition for a CRAC collection for a Redfish implementation.

CRAH.description: This is the definition for a CRAH collection.
CRAH.longDescription: These properties shall be the definition for a CRAH collection for a Redfish implementation.

Chiller.description: This is the definition for a Chiller collection.
Chiller.longDescription: These properties shall be the definition for a Chiller collection for a Redfish implementation.

CoolingTower.description: This is the definition for a CoolingTower collection.
CoolingTower.longDescription: These properties shall be the definition for a CoolingTower collection for a Redfish implementation.

DCIMCoolingType.description: The actual DCIM Cooling Type of DCIMCooling.
DCIMCoolingType.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual DCIM Cooling Type of DCIMCooling.

Humidity.description: Contains the array of 1 or more humidity sensors.
Humidity.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of sensors that measure humidity.

Links.description: Contains references to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: The Links property, as described by the Redfish Specification, shall contain references to resources that are related to, but not contained by (subordinate to), this resource.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

Sensors.description: The naivgation pointer to the collection of sensors located in the equipment and sub-components.
Sensors.longDescription: This property shall be a reference to a resource of type SensorCollection that contains the sensors located in the equipment and sub-components.

Status.description: This property describes the status and health of the resource and its children.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.

Temperature.description: Contains the array of 1 or more temperature sensors.
Temperature.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of sensors that measure temperature.

TriggeredAlarms.description: Contains the array of 0 or more triggered alarms.
TriggeredAlarms.longDescription: This array shall contain the set of Members of the Alarm Collection which have an 'AlarmStatus' of 'Triggered'.

Links.description: Contains references to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This type, as described by the Redfish Specification, shall contain references to resources that are related to, but not contained by (subordinate to), this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Chassis.description: An array of references to the chassis associated with this cooling zone.
Chassis.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resource that this cooling zone is associated with and shall reference a resource of type Chassis.

ManagedBy.description: An array of references to the Managers responsible for managing this cooling zone.
ManagedBy.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resource that manages this cooling zone and shall reference a resource of type Manager.

Oem.longDescription: This object represents the Oem property.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification.

RelatedSystems.description: An array of references to the computer systems associated with this cooling zone.
RelatedSystems.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resource that this cooling zone is associated with and shall reference a resource of type ComputerSystem.

OemActions.description: The available OEM specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

title: #DCIMCooling.v0_2_0.DCIMCooling
